rows.label: qst104213_msg0001
rows.name:
Legendary hero...shining princess...
teensy fairy...

rows.label: qst104213_msg0002
rows.name:
Meh-meh! Lapupu engrossed in world
of fiction!

rows.label: qst104213_msg0003
rows.name:
Lapupu still only littlepon, and
not really sparkly-sparkly princess...

rows.label: qst104213_msg0004
rows.name:
In fiction, Lapupu can become anyone!
Like swishy-swashy hero or fluffy-puff
princess or zip-a-zip fairy!

rows.label: qst104213_msg0005
rows.name:
But, becoming someone else make it
easier to understand others, show
kindness. Lapupu want all to know this.

rows.label: qst104213_msg0006
rows.name:
Lapupu teach language at Iyasaki?
Ooh...Lapupu not sure.

rows.label: qst104213_msg0007
rows.name:
Mamapon always say Nopon should
follow heart and live free, so she
probably not object, but still...

rows.label: qst104213_msg0008
rows.name:
Listen. There something Lapupu really
want. Mamapon always say Lapupu is
too young for that, but Lapupu needs it.

rows.label: qst104213_msg0009
rows.name:
Is cosmetics and accessories.
Important possessions for any
princess.

rows.label: qst104213_msg0010
rows.name:
Lapupu want to become more like
princess even outside of book.

rows.label: qst104213_msg0011
rows.name:
That why Lapupu need 7,500G, to go
on fairytale shopping spree!

rows.label: qst104213_msg0012
rows.name: Pay 7,500G?

rows.label: qst104213_msg0013
rows.name: Pay

rows.label: qst104213_msg0014
rows.name: Don't pay

rows.label: qst104213_msg0081
rows.name:
Oh well... Lapupu just have to buy
cosmetics for self when older.

rows.label: qst104213_msg0082
rows.name:
Maybe by then Lapupu already
more like sparkly-sparkly princess?

rows.label: qst104213_msg0101
rows.name:
Lapupu need 7,500G to transform
with princess makeover!

rows.label: qst104213_msg0151
rows.name:
Yay-yay! Lapupu go shopping now!
Become like sparkly-sparkly princess!

rows.label: qst104213_msg0152
rows.name:
Once Lapupu done with shopping
spree, Lapupu go straight to Iyasaki.

rows.label: qst104213_msg0153
rows.name:
Lapupu quite excited to travel.
Never been on adventure
outside of book before!

rows.label: qst104213_msg0154
rows.name: Bye-bye then!

rows.label: qst104213_msg0181
rows.name:
Oh, friends found different teacher?
Lapupu tried being teacher in book.
Was lots of fun.

rows.label: qst104213_msg0201
rows.name:
...Actually, Lapupu know that become
a fluffy-puff princess in real life would
be very convenient.
